doc:
Joan Barclay https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joan_Barclay 0 Joan Barclay (born Mary Elizabeth Greear, August 31, 1914 – November 22, 2002) was an American film actress of the 1930s and 1940s, starring mostly in B-movies and cliffhangers, with her career starting during the silent film era. Joan_Barclay ( born Mary_Elizabeth_Greear , August_31_,_1914 – November_22_,_2002 ) was an_American_film_actress of the_1930s_and_1940s , starring mostly in B-movies_and_cliffhangers , with her_career starting during the_silent_film_era .
